title: Super Bowl Shuffle with '85 Bears QB Jim McMahon!
itunes:title: Super Bowl Shuffle with '85 Bears QB Jim McMahon!
description:
In the 1980's, QB Jim McMahon was the bad boy of the NFL and his team, the Super Bowl winning 1985 Chicago Bears, is widely considered to be one of the best teams of all time. It's been nearly 40 years since the "Super Bowl Shuffle" was unleashed on the American public but Jim is still a badass and he doesn't give two-shits about what you think. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
